resources.string: You did not validate multimedia resources for the app that was just installed! This app will not be visible to users on the log-in screen until multimedia is validated.
You did not validate multimedia resources for this app! The app will not be visible to users on the log-in screen until multimedia is validated.
Select an app to view its management options, or install a new app.
Warning: The app you have installed is from an outdated build. For full functionality of multiple application seating, please make a new build of your app.
CommCare will uninstall your app and then reboot to save changes.
In order to complete this action, CommCare must log out the currently logged-in app. Do you want to proceed?
CommCare was unable to migrate your app data for an upgrade. To resolve this issue, please uninstall CommCare from your device and then relaunch it.

CommCare was unable to migrate all of your data during an application upgrade. Please restart CommCare to try to fix this. If this message persists, you may need to \'Clear data\' for CommCare in your device\'s Settings menu.

You have reached your limit of installed apps; you may only have up to %s apps installed at once.\n\nIf you would like to install a new app, you may uninstall an existing app first, which can be done from the app manager.
The following privileges are enabled on your device:\n\n %s
Special privileges are not enabled on your device.
Didn\'t recognize the privilege activation code. Please update CommCare

If you have a superuser account on HQ, you can enable certain privileges on your device by going to the \'Enable Privileges on Mobile\' tab of your \'My Account Settings\' page, and then scanning the barcode that appears there.
Log in as a mobile or web user to see a list of apps you can install
CommCare does not support upgrading from the previous CommCare version you were using. To resolve this issue, please uninstall CommCare from your device and then reinstall it.

* “Map Marker” symbol by P.J. Onori 
* "List" by Landan Lloyd 
* broken screen by Sam Martin from the Noun Project
Allows this app to read data from CommCare while a user is logged in
Allows this app to trigger operations like login, logout and sync in CommCare
Allows this app to logout a user from CommmCare App
Restricts external apps from accessing internal components
Permission group for CommCare Internal Actions
The username of the CommCare mobile worker to login and restore on the device
The password of the mobile user
The URL to your CommCare Application from the CommCareHQ publish page
Warning: attached large file of size %s mb. This could cause problems with submitting to the server depending on your network conditions.
Media attachment too large (%1$s mb). Max allowed size is %2$s mb.
File: %s is not a valid audio file.
This form cannot be edited once it has been marked as complete.
You are at the start of \"%s\". Swipe the screen as shown below to begin.
To navigate, swipe your finger horizontally on the screen as if turning pages in a book. Press the Menu button for more choices.
Sorry, %1$s of %2$s selected form(s) failed to delete!
Using %1$s provider. Please wait for greater accuracy.
Sorry, you have not selected any forms!
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry getting and filling out a blank form.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry finalizing saved forms before sending.
Sorry, your memory card is not working!
The server has not provided an available-forms document compatible with Aggregate 0.9.x. : %s
The server has not provided an available-forms document compatible with the OpenRosa version 1.0 standard: %s
Please wait. This could take a few minutes.
Please save form to keep your responses.
You are at the end of \"%s\".
Please enter username and password for server:\n%s
Manifest reply does not report an OpenRosa version -- bad server?
Manifest entry %s is missing one or more tags: filename, hash, or downloadUrl
XForm parse error. %1$s is missing element %2$s
Saved name must not be blank!
The location providers on this device are currently disabled. Do you want to change those settings?
Follow the link below to install CommCare LTS from the Play Store, and then try installing your app again.
This app requires CommCare LTS. Click the button below to open CommCare LTS, and then try installing your app again.
Follow the link below to install CommCare(Non LTS) from the Play Store, and then try installing your app again.
This app requires CommCare(Non LTS). Click the button below to open CommCare, and then try installing your app again.
Your device time is incorrectly set. Please click the Correct Time button below to change your time settings.
CommCare has entered recovery mode due to a problem with your app. We are trying to recover your app. Please wait...
Recovery failed due to bad internet. Please make sure that you have a stable internet connection and try again
Recovery failed due to an unknown reason. Please try again or reinstall your app by going to App Manager
App recovery has been successful. Please press back to resume your work
Send successful. All %s forms were submitted
There were errors submitting the forms.
There were errors submitting the forms. Only %s were submitted. Please try again later
Forms submissing failed due to poor network
Forms are not available. Make sure your phone storage is available
No network connection. Please check your internet and try again.
The app is outdated and can no longer communicate with the server. Please update the app on the Google Play Store.
Notifications for error messages when something breaks say on installing a CommCare app or while syncing forms with server
Notification containing information around current user session like when the current session is scheduled to expire
Notifications for status of any background server communication happening at the moment like CommCare App updates, log submission etc.
Notifications sent from server directly to notify user of priority tasks
Your app needs to be reinstalled due to a problem, please select a method for reinstalling.
Recovery procedures have been initiated for your CommCare App due to a problem with it. Please wait...
An error occurred when CommCare tried to execute a recovery measure. We will try again later. If the problem persists please contact helpdesk
An error occurred during recovery. Error details - \n %1$s
Scanning your phone for ccz files

We found a CCZ file for the app on your phone. We are still scanning your device to see if there is a newer CCZ file present. You can wait for the scan to complete or click reinstall below to immediately reinstall the app
No CCZ file found for your app. You can manually locate CCZ file by clicking \"Select CCZ\" button below. In case you can not find CCZ file on your phone, please contact your help desk.
You need a file manager to access the files on this device. You have not installed a file manager, please go to the Google Play Store and download a file manager, then return to this screen.
Unable to process the CCZ file you selected. Please retry
An error occurred while loacting CCZ file on your phone. Please retry or locate CCZ file manually by clicking \"Select CCZ\" button below.
An error occurred while installing the app from CCZ file. Please retry or locate CCZ file manually by clicking \"Select CCZ\" button below.
Sync is required to install this update. Auto initiating sync...
An error occurred while downloading the requested media. Please try again
Video file is missing for this question, click the download button above to download
Image file is missing for this question, Click the download button above to download
Audio file is missing for this question, click the download button above to download
Media not found in the application
Turn on your location to receive location updates
CommCare is still trying to get your location. Please wait or click Cancel to abort.
Invalid %1s, value must be 255 characters or less
This form introduces an invalid case relationship
You are not allowed to run CommCare on a rooted device. Please use a non rooted device
No endpoint exist with id %1$s. Valid endpoints are %2$s
Incorrect arguments supplied for endpoint %1$s. Supplied arguments: %2$s. Expected arguments: %3$s.
CommCare needs %s application to be installed on your device before you can continue
CommCare needs below applications to be installed on your device before you can continue-
No Play Store found on your device
Required CommCare App is not installed on device
I have read and agree to Dimagi\'s Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Business Agreement and Acceptable Use Policy.
I acknowledge and understand that I may receive push notifications and SMS messages for the purpose of communication
Please enter your primary phone number
Enter a phone number of a friend or family who can provide you an SMS OTP if you forget your Code.
Phone number is already in use
Can not use your alt. number
Alt. number must be different than primary
Please choose a password for recovery
Please enter your recovery password to continue.
Don\'t have or forgot your password?
You entered the wrong password, please try again.
You entered the wrong password too many times, you will need to recover your account.
You entered the wrong Code, please try again.
You entered the wrong Code too many times, you will need to recover your account.\n On the next screen, we\'ll send a code via SMS to the alternate phone number associated with your account.
You entered the wrong Code too many times, you will have to configure the code again.\n On the next screen, we\'ll redirect you to the configure code page.
We are still busy processing your previous request. Please try again in some time.
Please enter the primary phone number you entered with your account
On the next screen, we\'ll send a code via SMS to the alternate phone number associated with your account.
You have successfully recovered your account and can now resume using your ConnectID.
Error finalizing recovery, please try again later
You will need to configure this biometric manually in the Android settings.
Primary and alt phones must be different
Your ConnectID account has been successfully created and is now ready for you to use!
Please configure a method below to unlock both your device and ConnectID account
Your fingerprint has already been configured and will be used to unlock ConnectID.
Your PIN has already been configured and will be used to unlock ConnectID.
We attempted to send you a SMS ending with %s.
We attempted to send you a SMS on your secondary phone number.
Almost there! Please enter the code sent via SMS to your alternate phone%s.
In order to deactivate your account, please enter the code sent by SMS to your primary phone number.
Didn\'t receive your code? Resend in %d s
You have not been invited to any active opportunities. Please come back later.
You\'re not training for any jobs right now
You don\'t have any active jobs right now
There are no available opportunities right now
Complete the following learn modules and earn a certificate
You have completed %d of %d lessons.\nFinish learning to earn your certificate.
You haven\'t completed any lessons.\nStart learning to earn your certificate.
You have earned a certificate for this job and are eligible to claim the job and begin delivering care.\nYour score: %d\nPassing score: %d
Complete the assessment to finish training.
Sorry, you did not earn a passing score on your assessment. Please try again.\nYour score: %d\nPassing score: %d
The job has ended. You will not earn any progress for additional work.
Claim Job Below and Download Deliver App
The last date for the project is over. You will be notified if the opportunity opens up again.
The last date for the project is over and visits will not count towards payment.
You have reached the maximum number of visits, additional visits will not count towards payment.
The job has ended. You will not earn any progress for additional work.
The job has not started yet. You will not earn any progress for work.
You have passed the assessment and are ready to deliver. View job status to proceed.
You have completed the maximum number of visits. You will not earn any progress for additional work.
You have reached the maximum number of visits for today. You will not earn any progress for additional work.
You have reached the maximum number of visits for %s.
You have reached your daily limit for %s.

You may not see your expected progress if your number of visits exceeds the maximum for the day OR if your forms have not been uploaded. You can wait for your forms to sync with a better network and check progress again.
You got paid!\n%s %s paid %s.\nHave you received the payment?
Failed to send confirmation, we will ask again later.
Do you want to link this login to your ConnectID account? You will not need to type your password in the future.
I see you logged in with your password although ConnectID was configured for auto-login. Would you like to sever this login from ConnectID?
App install failed due to an unknown error
User is Suspended. Please contact admin.
An error occurred while connecting to the server.
I have read and agree to Dimagi’s Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Business Agreement and Acceptable Use Policy.
Are you sure you want to permanently deactivate this account? Once finished, you will need to register a new account for this phone number.
Account deactivated, you may now register a new account with your primary phone number
You want to deactivate you account permanently?
Daily Limit reached. No Payment for submitting forms
Unlock ConnectID first and then enter your app.
Please confirm your secondary phone by %s to keep using ConnectID.
A problem occurred with the database, please recover your account.
Do you agree to open a messaging thread on this channel?
You received a new message from %s, press here to view.
A new messaging channel is available from %s, press here to view
